name: HHKB Professional Hybrid Type-S
description: Legendary Japanese keyboard with silenced Topre electrostatic capacitive switches. Features Bluetooth and USB-C, compact 60-key layout, and the iconic HHKB layout loved by programmers.

reviews.review_text: Topre thock is addictive. Cannot go back to MX.
The layout takes time but becomes second nature.
Expensive but it is a buy-it-for-life keyboard.
